verses.1: Keimah in mual tung lam ka en to hi. Keimah huhna koi lai pan hong pai ding ahi hiam?
verses.2: Vanlelei a bawl Topa º kiang panin keimah huhna hong pai hi.
verses.3: Amah in ka khe taalsak lo dinga, kei hong kem pa lusu lo ding hi.
verses.4: En un, Israel a kem pa lusu lo a, zong ihmu lo hi.
verses.5: Topa in nang hong cing dinga, nangmah a hong hu dingin na kiangah hong om hi.
verses.6: Sunin ni in nang hong gimsak lo dinga, zanin kha in zong nang hong su kha lo ding hi.
verses.7: Topa in siatna khempeuh panin nang hong hu dinga, amah in a muanhuai-in nang hong kem ding hi.
verses.8: Topa in tua kipan a tawntungin na vak suk na vak tohna ah nang hong kem ding hi.
